summary: dan gives phil shit about whatever he finds interesting (ie maple-syrup-scented money) but will ultimately still humour him (ie...
body:
dan gives phil shit about whatever he finds interesting (ie maple-syrup-scented money) but will ultimately still humour him (ie by smelling said money) because, at the end of the day, dan is still fascinated and awed by phil’s mind

there’s still a piece of dan - that 17yo boy sat in his boring bedroom on his laptop watching the newest AmazingPhil video - that wants to be just like phil

reblog.comment:
dan gives phil shit about whatever he finds interesting (ie maple-syrup-scented money) but will ultimately still humour him (ie by smelling said money) because, at the end of the day, dan is still fascinated and awed by phil’s mind

there’s still a piece of dan - that 17yo boy sat in his boring bedroom on his laptop watching the newest AmazingPhil video - that wants to be just like phil

trail.content_raw:
dan gives phil shit about whatever he finds interesting (ie maple-syrup-scented money) but will ultimately still humour him (ie by smelling said money) because, at the end of the day, dan is still fascinated and awed by phil’s mind

there’s still a piece of dan - that 17yo boy sat in his boring bedroom on his laptop watching the newest AmazingPhil video - that wants to be just like phil
trail.content:
dan gives phil shit about whatever he finds interesting (ie maple-syrup-scented money) but will ultimately still humour him (ie by smelling said money) because, at the end of the day, dan is still fascinated and awed by phil’s mind

there’s still a piece of dan - that 17yo boy sat in his boring bedroom on his laptop watching the newest AmazingPhil video - that wants to be just like phil

blog.description:
lauren | 16 | phillie | ii 17/05/18

dan and phil taking over my life since 2013

summary: i have an analysis and y’all ain’t gonna like it.
body:
i have an analysis and y’all ain’t gonna like it.

right so i feel as if the phandom have kinda confined dan and phil from being who they really are. like regardless of sexuality, they still act really closed.

for example, you tubers such as joe sugg and caspar lee do jokes that involve more touchy stuff, yet i feel as though dnp don’t do that in fear that we instantly take it the wrong way.

i feel like we should take a step back a bit and then we might get content that you wanna see.

reblog.comment:

summary: That last love for dan made me cry. Like legit tears running down my face ugly crying
question: That last love for dan made me cry. Like legit tears running down my face ugly crying
answer:
honestly same????? there is just so so much love for dan i love all of yall for sending these in even though i’m sobbing he is just such a wonderful person and i hope he knows how much he’s loved and respected and supported by his fans like….. @ dan we out here cryin over how inspirational and wonderful you are okay? and please know you deserve every single bit of the love we have for you

tell me what you love about dan

tags: i have a lot of feelings about dan okay
he is just so talented and like....humble at the same time?
but put him on stage or in front of a camera and he is AMAZING
i always wonder what would've happened had he gone into theater
but i mean then he might never have met phil so
summary: I love how confident Dan is now! He knows what he's doing and I'm so proud
question: I love how confident Dan is now! He knows what he's doing and I'm so proud
answer:
oh my god Rant Time okay he is so confident like esp on stage? i have seen ii *cough* times and literally every second he’s on stage he knows how to command attention, we all know how well he can tell a story, this boy’s improv skills are off the fuckin charts, he is amazing at reading his audience and what they want (i jokingly complain he doesn’t know but lbr he is Aware), and he is so so incredibly sure of himself. i think that’s what it comes down to like, in the past there was so much more insecurity in what he did, now it’s very clear he owns his content and the things he’s doing, he makes it his own and doesn’t apologize for being himself, and it’s really a fucking beautiful thing like yes go out there and live your truth bb

tell me what you love about dan

summary: I wanna be Phil Lester levels of pure. I wanna radiate warmth just through the smallest smile, the silliest video or the most...
body:
I wanna be Phil Lester levels of pure. I wanna radiate warmth just through the smallest smile, the silliest video or the most random tweet. I wanna be surrounded by good people, and attract good people in my circle.

Phil Lester is all I aspire to be
